about_the_game:
SUMMARY


Welcome to the Backrooms Journey: Into the Unknown

Embark on an eerie and expansive journey through the surreal world of the Backrooms in "Backrooms Journey: Into the Unknown." Inspired by the unsettling internet phenomenon, this game transports you into a sprawling, interconnected maze where reality twists and turns.

KEY FEATURES:


  • Immerse Yourself in a Vast, Open World: Wander through a labyrinthine map filled with endless corridors, rooms, and hidden passages. The Backrooms sprawl endlessly, offering a dynamic and unpredictable exploration experience.

  • Survive and Navigate the Unknown: Encounter strange entities and navigate through shifting environments where danger lurks around every corner. Adapt to the ever-changing challenges of this mysterious dimension.

  • Discover the Secrets of the Backrooms: Uncover fragments of lore and piece together the truth behind this enigmatic realm. Each discovery reveals more about its origins and the unsettling forces that inhabit it.


Will You Escape, or Become Lost in the Abyss?

Experience an atmospheric journey with immersive soundscapes and haunting visuals that capture the eerie ambiance of the Backrooms. Delve deep into the unknown, where each step forward leads to new revelations and unexpected encounters.

SOCIALS:


  • DISCORD COMMUNITY

name: Backrooms Journey: Into the unknown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600 X
  • Graphics: Ryzen RX 6700 xt
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Explore the vast, ever-shifting world of the Backrooms in this eerie adventure. Navigate endless corridors, encounter otherworldly entities, and uncover the secrets hidden within this surreal realm.
